title: The Earth is Crying in our Hearts
itunes:title: The Earth is Crying in our Hearts
description: The Earth is Crying in our Hearts - The suffering in our world arises out of a sense of separation—from our own bodies and hearts, each other, and this living web.  These two talks explore this trance of separation and how it's led humans to destroying our larger body, earth. We then look at the pathways of awakening to the truth of “interbeing” and responding to our precious world with love.

We then look at the pathways of awakening to the truth of “interbeing” and responding to our precious world with love.
